id: Design Strategy Project Document Notion Template
name: Design Strategy Project Document Notion Template
description: A Notion template to help you define your design strategy for any project.Aligning your team and setting the tone and direction for a design project is crucial. This template can be used to do both. It's robust enough to use as-is, or it can be customized to fit any project scope and size.Sections include: Project Summary - what the project is all about People - who's involved with the project Process - how you'll get to where you're going Challenges - the business and user problems you'll solve
features: Project Summary - what the project is all about; People - who's involved with the project; Process - how you'll get to where you're going; Challenges - the business and user problems you'll solve; Goal - your key objectives; Metrics - how you'll measure success; Deliverables - what the output will be
